Sentencas: The feasibility of adding glass to conventional SOFC cathode contact materials in order to improve bonding to adjacent materials in the cell stack is assessed.
Titulo: Glass-containing composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A variety of candidate glass compositions are added to LSM and SSC.
Titulo: Glass-containing composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The important properties of the resulting composites, including conductivity, sintering behavior, coefficient of thermal expansion, and adhesion to LSCF and Mn1.5Co1.5O4-coated 441 stainless steel are used as screening parameters.
Titulo: Glass-containing composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Adhesion of LSM to LSCF improved from 3.9 to 5.3 MPa upon addition of SCZ-8 glass.
Titulo: Glass-containing composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Adhesion of LSM to coated stainless steel improved from 1.8 to 3.9 MPa upon addition of Schott GM31107 glass.
Titulo: Glass-containing composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The most promising cathode contact material/glass composites are coated onto Mn1.5Co1.5O4-coated 441 stainless steel substrates and subjected to area-specific resistance testing at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Glass-containing composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In all cases, area-specific resistance is found to be in the range 2.5-7.5 mOhm cm(2) and therefore acceptable.
Titulo: Glass-containing composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Indeed, addition of glass is found to improve bonding of the cathode contact material layer without sacrificing acceptable conductivity.
Titulo: Glass-containing composite cathode contact materials for solid oxide fuel cells
